text: Bob Wells may refer to: * Bob Wells (baseball) (born 1966), former professional baseball player * Bob "Hoolihan" Wells (born 1933), former news/weather anchor and television personality * Bob Wells (radio host), Christian radio talk show host * Bob Wells (American football) (1945-1994), American football player * Bob Wells, manager of the minor league baseball team Springfield Midgets ==See also== * Robert Wells (disambiguation)
title: Bob Wells
